akn:content.akn:p:
§ 10312. Authorization of appropriations There are hereby authorized to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out the provisions of chapters 103 to 107 of this title. (Pub. L. 89–110, title I, § 18, Aug. 6, 1965, 79 Stat. 446; renumbered title I, Pub. L. 91–285, § 2, June 22, 1970, 84 Stat. 314.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 1973o of Title 42, The Public Health and Welfare, prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
